job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Hospital & Health Care,Information Technology and Services
job.description: <p><strong>Data Scientist</strong></p><p>BETSOL is looking for a Data Scientist!</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>We’re looking for someone with experience manipulating data sets and building statistical models.</p><p>An ideal candidate should have excellent communication skills, solid programming and problem-solving skills, and a solid grasp of statistics and/or Machine Learning.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>What You'll Do</strong></p><p>As a Data Scientist you will support data-science and other analytics as needed. You will Develop SQL queries and data sets as well as develop business and client facing reports.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Understand business problems and suggest data and analytic solutions to support decision makers.</li><li>Help develop and transform data sets using variety of programming languages.</li><li>Develop and test analytic hypotheses using established methods.</li><li>Create data visualizations that convey a clear story about what is observed in the data.</li><li>Design, develop, and validate predictive and explanatory models using a wide variety of models.</li><li>Communicate results to variety of audiences.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><span class="ql-cursor"></span>Qualifications</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelor’s degree with evidence of quantitative aptitude. </li><li>4-6 years of experience with agent-based, discrete event, or systems dynamics modeling methodologies; manipulating data sets and building statistical models, doing analysis, causal inference </li><li>4-6 years of experience programming in R, Python, or another programming language.</li><li>4-6 years of experience using analytical or statistical software technologies </li><li>Experience with data cleaning, manipulation, discovery, analysis, and visualization of data</li><li>Experience creating and using advanced machine learning algorithms and statistics: regression, simulation, scenario analysis, modeling, clustering, decision trees, neural networks, etc.&nbsp;</li><li>Knowledge and experience in statistical and data mining techniques: GLM Regression, Random Forest, Boosting, Trees, text mining, social network analysis, etc.</li><li>Experience visualizing/presenting data for stakeholders </li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Preferred Experience</strong></p><ul><li>Master’s degree or Ph.D. in computer science, statistics, data science, mathematics, engineering or other quantitative field </li><li>Analytic or operational experience and / or education in Pharmacy, Nursing, Public Health, or other relevant medicine topics is appreciated.</li><li>Experience using statistical computer languages (R, Python, SQL, etc.)</li><li>Experience in Health care industry a plus; specifically working for a health-plan, data collection in Medicaid space.</li></ul><p></p>
